titles: The interest of reason in religion with the import & use of scripture-metaphors, and the nature of the union betwixt Christ & believers : (with reflections on several late writings, especially Mr. Sherlocks Discourse concerning the knowledg of Jesus Christ, &c.) modestly enquired into and stated / by Robert Ferguson.
author: Ferguson, Robert, d. 1714.
notes: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
keywords: Sherlock, William, 1641?-1707. --  Discourse concerning the knowledge of Jesus Christ.
